title: Misconfigured FTP Access
description: Exploit a misconfigured FTP server that allows unauthorized access.
hints: Check if the FTP server allows anonymous login.
Try listing files in the FTP server as an anonymous user.
Look for any file that stands out, such as 'flag.txt'.
learningObjectives: Understand the implications of FTP configuration errors.
Learn to identify and exploit anonymous FTP access.
Gain experience with basic FTP commands.
